data.title: Luxury Villa For Sale in Andratx, Mallorca, Spain

data.text:
Project Overview:

A super luxury villa for sale that comes with all the modern amenities to pamper you with luxury you need in. This villa stands out from other luxury property due to its charm, astonishing view of the sea and mountains in the surrounding. This home is creatively designed to provide each space with full of luxury and peace. It consists of 3 bedrooms + 3 bathroom and the entire area of the property covers 21,528 Sq Ft.

The villa offers a special living area, spacious dining room, well stocked library, fireplace etc. On the ground floor there is a separate laundry room and a modular kitchen with direct access to exterior area. Each room here gives direct access to the swimming pool and beautiful terraces. On the first floor there are Master bedrooms with high quality fixture and in the basement area you can spend your weekend watching your favorite movies in the private theatre. Not only this but also you can enjoy in the entertainment area, wine cellar, Sauna etc.

This property has some additional apartment space for your staffs and guests. Some of the amenities include indoor pool, wellness area, steam, sauna and a huge garage to easily accommodate 10 cars in total. The property is situated in Las Brisas in Port Andratx, Mallorca in Spain which is very close to all the major locations in the vicinity.

Specifications :

Staff Quarters

Terrace

Outdoor Space

Wine Cellar

Grotto

5 + Car Garage

Security System

Amenities :
